description: The game of Mousetrap with n cards: the number of permutations of n cards having at least one hit after 2.
comments: The subsequence of primes begins: 3, 13, 397, 2819, no more through a(19). - _Jonathan Vos Post_, Feb 01 2011

formula: a(n) = A001563(n) - A002469(n+2). (corrected by _Sean A. Irvine_ and _Joerg Arndt_, Feb 10 2014)
